pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot with a slow camera pullback. The scene reveals a large, eccentrically designed house perched on a cliff edge within a dense, misty forest. In the background, rolling mountains are visible under a dramatic, warm-toned, and cloudy sky.
